languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Выверенная атака дает {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативнику{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, равный (число снятых уровней эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}" / 2) (минимум 1) до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Precise Attack grants the Adept a bonus to Perception equal to (number of clues removed)/3 (minimum 1).
Precise Attack grants the Adept a bonus to Perception equal to (number of exploits removed / 3<)/u> (minimum 1).
Precise Attack grants the Adept a bonus to Perception equal to (number of exploits removed / 3<)/u> (minimum 1).

Precise Attack grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to (number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2) (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Выверенная атака{/g} дает {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативнику{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, равный <u>(число снятых уровней эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} / 2)</u> (минимум 1) до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Выверенная атака{/g} дает {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативнику{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, равный <u>(число снятых уровней эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} / 2)</u> (минимум 1) до конца боя. Выверенная атака дает адепту бонус к Восприятию, равный (число снятых уязвимостей / 3) (минимум 1).

languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}精准攻击{/g}会提高{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，等同于<u>（移除的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}层数/2）</u>，至少提高1点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 精准攻击会提高{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，等同于（移除的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}层数/2），至少提高1点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: 精密攻撃により{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}に対して(失われた{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}数/2) (最小1)に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Precise Attack grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to (number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2) (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 精密攻撃により{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}に対して(失われた{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}数/2) (最小1)に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Ataque preciso{/g} proporciona al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} igual a <u>(número de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} eliminadas / 2)</u> (mínimo 1) hasta el final del combate. Se acumula.
languages.original_text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Ataque preciso proporciona al adepto una bonificación a Percepción igual a (número de vulnerabilidades eliminadas / 3)<)/u> (mínimo 1).

languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Präziser Angriff{/g} gewährt dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} in Höhe von <u>(Anzahl der entfernten {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzungen{/g} / 2)</u> (mindestens 1). Kann gestacked werden.
languages.original_text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Präziser Angriff gewährt dem Adepten einen Bonus auf Wahrnehmung in Höhe von (Anzahl der entfernten Ausnutzungen / 3<)/u> (mindestens 1).

Präziser Angriff gewährt dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} in Höhe von (Anzahl der entfernten {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzungen{/g} / 2) (mindestens 1). Kann gestacked werden.

languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Attaque précise{/g} confère à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} correspondant à <u>(nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} supprimées / 2)</u> (minimum 1) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Precise Attack{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed / 2)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Attaque précise confère à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} correspondant à (nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} supprimées / 2) (minimum 1) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Attaque précise confère à l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} correspondant à (nombre d'{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} supprimés / 2) (minimum 1) jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Keskin Saldırı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliğine <u>(kaldırılan {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} sayısı / 2)</u> (minimum 1) kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
